a.detail: A rotting odor fills the corridor
a.summary: A rotting odor fills the corridor

c.detail: Someone has scrawled a strange symbol here

e.detail: A group of demonic faces have been carved into the walls

details.history: The dungeon was created by kuo-toa as a treasure vault. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has fallen to ruin and been rebuilt many times since then.
details.temperature:
Very Hot (DC 10 Constitution save each hour
    or gain one level of exhaustion)

south.desc: Secret (DC 15 to find) Unlocked Good Wooden Door (15 hp)
south.secret: The door is located above a small stone dais and concealed behind an area of fungus

south.desc: Stuck Iron Door (DC 25 to break; 60 hp)

detail.room_features: A wooden platform hangs over a deep pit in the north-west corner of the room, and spirals of red stones cover the floor

north.desc: Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

settings.name: The Sanctum of the Lich Princess

wandering_monsters.1: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); deadly, 450 xp, actively patrolling their territory
wandering_monsters.2: Mimic (cr 2, mm 220); deadly, 450 xp, scavenging for food and treasure
wandering_monsters.3: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); deadly, 450 xp, tracking the party
wandering_monsters.4: 2 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166) and 2 x Wolf (cr 1/4, mm 341); deadly, 200 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.5: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); deadly, 450 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
